New Records: Dorian Finney-Smith was the team's third-leading scorer with 17 points on 6-of-10 shooting.
Dennis Schroder, who came up with a clutch layup to cap off the Nets' night at 106 points, put 20 of his own to go along with six assists.
Key Match Events: Cameron Johnson was blocked with seconds to go, giving the Grizzlies an opportunity to win.
Post-Match Reflections: The balanced scoring speaks to the coaching and chemistry of the organization.
The Nets' veterans have emerged as some of the best role players in the NBA.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nets sit at.500 to start the season.
Jordi Fernandez's offense has been a positive for the team.
Others: The Grizzlies had an opportunity to win after Cameron Johnson was blocked with seconds to go.
